name: Damian Franciszek Pospiech
role_name: Software Engineer especializado/a en Inteligencia Artificial
profile_summary:
Results-driven Software Engineer specializing in **Artificial Intelligence** with over 13 years of experience in delivering high-performance backend solutions. Proficient in **Azure** services including **Functions**, **App Services**, **Cosmos DB**, and **Key Vault** to create scalable and secure applications. Skilled in developing APIs and implementing **AI solutions** across industries, including **Retrieval-Augmented Generation (RAG)** and **speech-to-text** technologies. Achieved significant results through collaboration and autonomous work paradigms.

Technical expertise includes **JavaScript/TypeScript**, **Python**, and **Flutter**, with frontline experience in **React**, **Next.js**, **Vue**, **Node.js**, **FastAPI**, and **Django**. Well-versed in deploying cloud-native architectures and implementing microservices and event-driven systems. Successfully integrated compliance with standards such as HIPAA, FHIR, PCI DSS, and SOC 2 into software solutions, maintaining a strong focus on security and ethical AI practices.

Background in MLOps showcases my capabilities in model training and orchestration using tools like **MLflow**, **Airflow**, and **Kubeflow**, ensuring optimal performance and reliability in AI-powered applications.
